item.title: How to make npcs teleport staff only
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

if (NPCID == 501) { if (playerRights >= 1) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(501), 4884); sendFrame126("Staff City", 4884); sendFrame126("Here I will take you to the Staff City.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); toX = 1979; toY = 5002; sendFrame75(501, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; } else if (playerRights < 1) { sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(501), 4884); sendFrame126("Staff City", 4884); sendFrame126("You do not sufficient privelages to enter the staff city.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(501, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; } }

Read full topic

item.title: How to make npcs teleport staff only

item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

how do i change this so that it will only teleport them if they have playerRights 1+

if(NPCID == 501){ sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(501), 4884); sendFrame126("Staff City", 4884); sendFrame126("Here I will take you to the Staff City.", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); toX = 1979; toY = 5002; sendFrame75(501, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }
ive tried adding && playerRights >= 1) {
and && playerRights = (1);
and alot more sot if some1 could help please tell me
